metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10376 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Gajim through 0.16.7 unconditionally implements the "XEP-0146: RemoteControlling Clients" extension. This can be abused by malicious XMPPservers to, for example, extract plaintext from OTR encrypted sessions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10376` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gajim - 0.16.6-1.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gajim package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.16.6-1.1').
